sentences.en: A portion of the manuscript is illegible.
sentences.cn: 相当数量的一部份手稿不易辨读.

sentences.en: Can you see what this note says — his writing is almost illegible!
sentences.cn: 你能看出这个便条上写些什么吗?他的笔迹几乎无法辨认.
客人的签字经常字迹潦草,难以辨认.
他的字迹完全无法辨认。

sentences.en: His signature was an illegible scrawl.
sentences.cn: 他的签名潦草难以辨认.

sentences.en: It is impossible to deliver this letter because the address is illegible.
sentences.cn: 由于地址字迹不清,致使信件无法投递.

sentences.en: Please write clearly. Illegible forms will have to be returned for clarification.
sentences.cn: 请书写清楚. 不清楚的表格要被退回,以便予以澄清.

sentences.en: The dullness of the pencil made his writing illegible.
sentences.cn: 粗钝的铅笔让他的字迹难以辨认.

sentences.en: The ink had faded so that many words were illegible.
sentences.cn: 墨水褪色了,所以许多词不易辨认了.

sentences.en: The lettering on the gravestone was badly worn and almost illegible.
sentences.cn: 墓碑上的文字已严重磨损难以辨认.

sentences.en: The writing is illegible; I cannot read what It'says.
sentences.cn: 字迹不清楚, 我看不清上面写的是什么.

sentences.en: The writing on the parchment had faded until it was almost illegible.
sentences.cn: 羊皮纸上的字迹已褪色,到了差不多让人认不清的地步.

sentences.en: This letter is as illegible as hieroglyphics.
sentences.cn: 这封信字迹太潦草,像天书似的.

sentences.en: To read or interpret ( ambiguous, obscure, or illegible matter ).
sentences.cn: 解读解读 ( 含混 、 难以理解或无法辨认的东西 )

trans.tran_cn: 难辨认的，字迹模糊的，潦草
